member.name: T:NAnt.SourceControl.Tasks.AbstractCvsTask
member.summary: A base class for creating tasks for executing CVS client commands on a CVS repository.

member.summary: Creates the CVS command object to execute against the specified CVS repository.

member.summary: Validates that all required information is available.

member.summary: Set the checkout/ update options.

member.summary: Cvsroot Variable.

member.name: T:NAnt.SourceControl.Tasks.CheckoutTask
member.summary: Checks out a CVS module to the required directory.

example.para: Checkout NAnt Revision named: "your_favorite_revision_here" to the folder "c:\src\nant\replacement_for_module_directory_name".
example.code: <cvs-checkout destination="c:\src\nant\" cvsroot=":pserver:anonymous@cvs.sourceforge.net:/cvsroot/nant" password="" module="nant"> <options> <option name="sticky-tag" value="your_favorite_revision_here" /> <option name="override-directory" value="replacement_for_module_directory_name" /> </options> </cvs-checkout>

example.para: Checkout NAnt Revision named: "your_favorite_revision_here" to the folder "c:\src\nant\replacement_for_module_directory_name".
example.code: <cvs-checkout destination="c:\src\nant\" cvsroot=":pserver:anonymous@cvs.sourceforge.net:/cvsroot/nant" password="" module="nant"> <options> <option name="-r" value="your_favorite_revision_here" /> <option name="-d" value="replacement_for_module_directory_name" /> </options> </cvs-checkout>

member.name: M:NAnt.SourceControl.Tasks.CheckoutTask.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:NAnt.SourceControl.Tasks.CheckoutTask.CreateCommand
member.summary: Creates the checkout command.
member.returns: An instance of the checkout command.

member.name: T:NAnt.SourceControl.Tasks.UpdateTask
member.summary: Updates a CVS module in a local working directory.

example.para: Update your nant revision named: "your_favorite_revision_here" in the folder "c:\src\nant\replacement_for_module_directory_name".
example.code: <cvs-update destination="c:\src\nant\" cvsroot=":pserver:anonymous@cvs.sourceforge.net:/cvsroot/nant" password="" module="nant"> <options> <option name="sticky-tag" value="your_favorite_revision_here" /> <option name="override-directory" value="replacement_for_module_directory_name" /> </options> </cvs-update>

example.para: Update your nant revision named: "your_favorite_revision_here" in the folder "c:\src\nant\replacement_for_module_directory_name".
example.code: <cvs-update destination="c:\src\nant\" cvsroot=":pserver:anonymous@cvs.sourceforge.net:/cvsroot/nant" password="" module="nant"> <options> <option name="-r" value="your_favorite_revision_here" /> <option name="-d" value="replacement_for_module_directory_name" /> </options> </cvs-update>

member.name: M:NAnt.SourceControl.Tasks.UpdateTask.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:NAnt.SourceControl.Tasks.UpdateTask.CreateCommand
member.summary: Creates an instance of the update command.
member.returns: An instance of the update command.

member.name: M:NAnt.SourceControl.Tasks.UpdateTask.PopulateFolders(ICSharpCode.SharpCvsLib.Misc.WorkingDirectory)
member.summary: Creates a list of files that need to be compared against the server and updated if necessary.
member.param: The directory to use in the comparison.
